name: Roasted Shrimp
author: Holly Van Lom
summary: This is a great, simple and fast way to cook shrimp that can go with anything! I've served it over linguine, with orzo and cream sauce, accompanying a steak, or alone as an appetizer - the possibilities are endless!
ingredients: 1 pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Arrange shrimp in a single layer in a stoneware baking dish
Combine garlic salt, parsley, and pepper and sprinkle over shrimp
Cut butter into small pieces and scatter over shrimp
Roast in the preheated oven, watching carefully, until shrimp turn pink, 5 to 10 minutes
